main event: On July 30, 1954, there was a UFO sighting in Mountain View, Missouri, involving two unidentified objects. Photos of the objects were forwarded to ATIC for evaluation.
interesting points: The observation was made using ground-radar.
The source of the report was a civilian.
The length of the observation was 2 minutes.
The source admitted that the contact stories were a hoax, questioning the credibility of the report.
The conclusion was that the objects were unidentified, possibly balloons or aircraft.
